page.title: 18CLUBS IN PULBOROUGH.
page.content: Pulborough has many clubs for hobbies and recreation , like the Flower Club, Over 60's Club, Open House Club and Women's Institute.The Stoolball Club meets in summer to play the old Sussex Game, using 2 bats & 2 wickets.They play in tournaments for a league winners cup.The Bowling Club meets 3 or 4 times a week in summer. The Pulborough Sports & Social Club includes many clubs.It has a new club house for the 300 members.The Cricket Club plays 1 or 2 games a week on the recreation ground.There are two Brownie packs meeting on Tuesdays & Thursdays from 4:30 _ 6:00.There are 16 children in the 1st Pulborough Brownies. We play games, make things & do badges.We are going to camp in Ashington in September.The Cub Scouts, Guides, Scouts & Sea Scouts meet in the Scouts Hut. We have a Youth Club.
